response.message: Great news, another milestone and big step.

@Robert: I noticed that in Area 51 there is a Home Improvement/Repair site in Beta. There is also a Home Repair Stack Exchange site paid for by someone else. To reduce confusion, are you going to merge the two sites or at least seed the newer site with the old questions and answers?
@Brian nobody has "paid for" anything on SE 1.0 -- no money ever changed hands, the service never came out of Beta.
